subject: Football (College)
Sports Injuries
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Coach like Alabama’s Nick Saban argue that spread offenses, because of their fast pace and more frequent number of plays and the way they limit defensive substitutions, lead to more injuries.
snippet: Coach like Alabama’s Nick Saban argue that spread offenses, because of their fast pace and more frequent number of plays and the way they limit defensive substitutions, lead to more injuries.
